articles.title: Caroline Kennedy confirmed by US Senate as next ambassador to Australia - ABC News
articles.description: The daughter of former US president John F Kennedy and a former US ambassador to Japan succeeds Arthur Culvahouse as US ambassador to Australia.
articles.content:
The US Senate has confirmed Caroline Kennedy, a former ambassador to Japan and daughter of the late President John F Kennedy, as the US ambassador to Australia.

articles.title: We Are Delighted to Inform You That Australia’s Bum-Breathing Irwin’s Turtle Is Back - Gizmodo Australia
articles.description: The Irwin's turtle, a species of turtle that breathes out of its butt, has been rediscovered in north Queensland through eDNA research.
articles.content:
Behold, the “bum-breathing” Irwin’s turtle, a breed of turtle that has been rediscovered in river systems it was thought to have previously left.

articles.title: Australia trusts Solomon Islands on Chinese military base, Dutton says - 9News
articles.description: Defence Minister Peter Dutton has insisted Australia wants a "strong friendship" with the Solomon Islands despite reports its Prime Minister will invite Chinese forces there.
